faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about my services

questions.question: What AI/ML services do you offer?
questions.answer: I specialize in deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, and workflow automation. This includes custom ML model development, image classification, object detection, gesture recognition, and LLM-powered automation solutions.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop a custom AI solution?
questions.answer: Timelines vary based on complexity. Simple models may take 2-4 weeks, while complex computer vision or NLP solutions can take 2-3 months. I provide detailed estimates after understanding your requirements.

questions.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
questions.answer: I work primarily with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Next.js for frontend development. I also use Python with Flask/Django for ML-integrated backends.

questions.question: Do you develop mobile applications?
questions.answer: Yes! I have 1.5+ years of experience in native Android development using Java and Kotlin, as well as cross-platform development with React Native.

questions.question: Can you integrate AI features into existing applications?
questions.answer: Absolutely. I specialize in seamlessly integrating AI capabilities (image recognition, NLP, predictions) into existing web and mobile applications through robust APIs.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after project delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer post-delivery support and maintenance packages to ensure your solution continues to perform optimally. This includes bug fixes, updates, and performance monitoring.
